statements: SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM Students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Students ORDER BY enrollment_date DESC;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM Students WHERE enrollment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM Students WHERE student_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM Students WHERE enrollment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT student_id, student_name, enrollment_date FROM Students WHERE student_id < 5 ORDER BY enrollment_date DESC;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM Students WHERE student_email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE student_id = 3 OR student_name = 'Alice';
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM students ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT student_id, first_name, last_name FROM students WHERE enrollment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT course_id, course_name FROM courses WHERE schedule_time BETWEEN '08:00:00' AND '12:00:00' ORDER BY course_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM students INNER JOIN courses ON students.student_id = courses.course_id;
SELECT student_id, first_name, last_name, enrollment_date FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, enrollment_date FROM students ORDER BY enrollment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM courses WHERE instructor = 'John Smith';
SELECT course_name, instructor, schedule_time FROM courses ORDER BY schedule_time ASC;
SELECT student_id, first_name, last_name, enrollment_date, course_name, instructor FROM students INNER JOIN courses ON students.student_id = courses.course_id;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM Students WHERE student_email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM Courses ORDER BY course_id DESC;
SELECT student_name, course_name FROM Students JOIN Enrollment ON Students.student_id = Enrollment.student_id JOIN Courses ON Enrollment.course_id = Courses.course_id;
SELECT MAX(enrollment_date) AS latest_enrollment_date FROM Enrollment;
SELECT * FROM Students
SELECT student_name, enrollment_date FROM Students WHERE enrollment_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT student_name, course_name FROM Students JOIN Enrollment ON Students.student_id = Enrollment.student_id JOIN Courses ON Enrollment.course_id = Courses.course_id

SELECT student_name, course_name, enrollment_date FROM Students JOIN Enrollment ON Students.student_id = Enrollment.student_id JOIN Courses ON Enrollment.course_id = Courses.course_id WHERE Students.student_name LIKE '%John%'

SELECT student_name, course_name, enrollment_date FROM Students JOIN Enrollment ON Students.student_id = Enrollment.student_id JOIN Courses ON Enrollment.course_id = Courses.course_id WHERE Courses.course_name = 'Mathematics'
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM Students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM Courses WHERE course_id > 3;
SELECT student_name, course_name, enrollment_date FROM Students JOIN Enrollments ON Students.student_id = Enrollments.student_id;
SELECT student_name, course_name, grade FROM Students JOIN Registrations ON Students.student_id = Registrations.student_id;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM Students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM Courses WHERE course_id = 2;
SELECT student_name, course_name, registration_date FROM Students JOIN Registrations ON Students.student_id = Registrations.student_id JOIN Courses ON Registrations.course_id = Courses.course_id;

SELECT Students.student_name, Courses.course_name, Registrations.grade FROM Students JOIN Registrations ON Students.student_id = Registrations.student_id JOIN Courses ON Registrations.course_id = Courses.course_id WHERE Registrations.grade >= 'B';
SELECT * FROM Courses;
SELECT course_id, course_name FROM Courses ORDER BY course_id DESC;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM Students WHERE enrollment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT professor_name, department FROM Professors WHERE professor_email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT student_name, course_name FROM Students JOIN Enrollments ON Students.student_id = Enrollments.student_id JOIN Courses ON Enrollments.course_id = Courses.course_id;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM Students WHERE enrollment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT course_name, course_description, course_credits FROM Courses WHERE course_credits > 3 ORDER BY course_credits DESC;
SELECT Students.student_name, Courses.course_name FROM Students JOIN Enrollments ON Students.student_id = Enrollments.student_id JOIN Courses ON Enrollments.course_id = Courses.course_id;

SELECT professor_name, course_name FROM Professors JOIN Professors_Courses ON Professors.professor_id = Professors_Courses.professor_id JOIN Courses ON Professors_Courses.course_id = Courses.course_id WHERE Professors.department = 'Science' ORDER BY professor_name ASC;
